text:
If you have conf/dirA/foo.conf and conf/dirB (without a conf file in it) the configuration

Include conf/*/foo.conf

gives an error, despite the wildcard expression matching at least one file. This is a bug.


httpd-dev thread starts at
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/201201.mbox/%3C201201221914.29589.sf%40sfritsch.de%3E
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
